title: CReSTeD Schools
name: CReSTeD Schools
description:
The Council for the Registration of Schools Teaching Dyslexic Pupils.

A list of schools in the UK who can demonstrate that their provision for dyslexia meets our criteria. We publish our criteria to allow parents, education professionals and those who help children with dyslexia to find the best school for their child.

The vast majority of schools on the Regsiter are mainstream schools althoug some are, of course, more specialised than others.
